pr_title: Adds support for tiered lists and barcode scan in Case Claim prompts

timeline.message: Toggle barcode visibility based on appearance for queryprompt
compact layout to make space for search results
Populates spinner choice items - basic version

timeline.bodyText: Does this handle blank entries effectively? It was unclear from the UI and I can't quite tell from the code how easy it is to "undo" entering a value into the spinner at all (which we definitely want to support)
timeline.author: ctsims

timeline.bodyText: Does this trigger a "selection changed" event at all, or is it only in like 208 that this gets processed?
timeline.author: ctsims

timeline.bodyText:
Am I right in assuming that it's this event loop that propagates out of order changes?
IE: If this spinner view is the last item in the 213 loop, and its value is changed on 208, this selected method is fired, and the loop is redone in case a previous spinner needs to be changed?
timeline.author: ctsims

timeline.message: adds an empty choice in spinners to provide users with a way to clear the answer
Saves edittexts answer in listener rather than when making a query to keep the answer set always updated
update itemset on non select changes
Correctly restores state on config changes
test fixes along with fix for error persistence across config changes
Fixes spinner state on config changes
Install fixtures in case claim test
